DOC.criteria: Aged 3560 , No antihypertensive treatment past present , 135 < SBP < 145 85 < DBP < 95 , Informed consent sign , Unwilling participate study , Treated essential , secondary complicate hypertension , SBP low 135 high 145 mmHg , DBP low 85 high 95 mmHg , Use medication ( statin , NSAI ect.. ) , Known allergy tomato , carotenoid , vitamin E , Diabetes Mellitus , Obesity BMI > 32 , Significant dyslipidemia , Patients ischemic pain , S/P MI , PTCA CABG , LVH CHF , Smoker , Valvular heart disease , PVD , Cerebrovascular disease , s/p CVA , TIA , Any kind kidney disease ( creatinine > 1.6 ) , Chronic liver disease ( elevate AST ALT least 2 time normal range ) , Alcohol abuse , History GI disease surgery , History malignancy past 5 year , History autoimmune disease , Participation research protocol
